short_summary: High current potentiostat / galvanostat required for electrochemical measurements
description: The National Research Council’s (NRC) Vancouver branch has a requirement for one high current potentiostat / galvanostat for electrochemical measurements, including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Notice Type:** Not Applicable

**Title (English):** NPP - Potentiostat / Galvanostat (Vancouver)

**Title (French):** APM - Potentiostat / Galvanostat (Vancouver)

**Reference Number:** cb-169-81139202

**Publication Date:** 2024-01-17

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-13T14:00:00 (EST)

**Amendment Number:** 4

**Solicitation Number:** 23-58191

**Amended Date:** 2024-02-13

## Tender Summary
The National Research Council Canada's Vancouver branch is seeking to acquire a high current potentiostat/galvanostat for electrochemical measurements. This equipment will be used for tasks including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.

## Tender Details

* A competitive bidding process is being utilized to select a supplier.
* The tender documents can be downloaded from [CanadaBuys.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29693/23-58191_npp_en.pdf) (English) and [AchatsCanada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29693/23-58191_npp_fr.pdf) (French)
* Bids are due by 2024-02-13 at 2:00 PM EST and the expected contract start date is on or around 2024-02-27.

## Contact and Procurement Information
Contact Tania Backes for further information regarding the tender.

* Phone: (613) 410-3834
* E-mail: [Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6, Canada
* Language (s): English and French

## Procurement Category and Agreement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Vancouver
